description: What types of scenarios should be included for comprehensive coverage?
question: Which scenario types should be covered?

options.name: Happy Path
options.description: Standard successful flow through the feature
options.when_to_use: Always include at least one happy path scenario

options.name: Edge Cases
options.description: Boundary conditions and unusual but valid inputs
options.when_to_use: When input validation or limits are important

options.name: Error Handling
options.description: Expected error conditions and how they should be handled
options.when_to_use: When failure modes need explicit documentation

options.name: Security Scenarios
options.when_to_use: When the feature handles sensitive data or access control

options.name: Performance Scenarios
options.description: Load handling, timeouts, and resource constraints

outcome: Selected scenario types guide the generation of comprehensive test coverage
